pages.text:
As mentioned in the yeast section, each yeast has a max alcohol content, but this is only achieved if the sweetness is high enough.

The sweetness is defined as the base sweetness of the must you put into the demijohn, along with any sugar you add to the mix.

pages.title: Sweetness
pages.text:
Both the alcohol content and sweetness of the wine in your bucket can be seen by hovering over it.

The alcohol ranges from 0% (for a must bucket) and 18%, while the sweetness has 5 values; Extra Dry, Dry, Semi-Dry, Sweet, Extra Sweet
